location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省大连市甘井子区
location.en: Ganjingzi District, Dalian, Liaoning, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 由辽宁省人民政府举办的省属公安本科院校，隶属于辽宁省公安厅。
description.en: A provincial public security undergraduate college run by the Liaoning Provincial People's Government and affiliated with the Liaoning Provincial Public Security Department.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work.

nodes.id: 辽宁警官高等专科学校

zh-cn: 辽宁警官高等专科学校

description.zh-cn: 辽宁警察学院的前身，是一所专科学校。
description.en: The predecessor of Liaoning Police College, it was a junior college.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 主管辽宁省公安工作的省政府组成部门。
description.en: The department of the provincial government in charge of public security work in Liaoning Province.

nodes.id: 辽宁省公安厅凌源劳改分局干部学校

zh-cn: 辽宁省公安厅凌源劳改分局干部学校

description.zh-cn: 辽宁警察学院的最早前身。
description.en: The earliest predecessor of Liaoning Police College.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 2014年5月，中华人民共和国教育部批准在辽宁警官高等专科学校基础上建立辽宁警察学院。
description.en: In May 2014, the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China approved the establishment of Liaoning Police College on the basis of the former Liaoning Police Officer College.

description.zh-cn: 辽宁警察学院隶属于辽宁省公安厅。
description.en: Liaoning Police College is affiliated with the Liaoning Provincial Public Security Department.

description.zh-cn: 辽宁警察学院由辽宁省人民政府举办。
description.en: Liaoning Police College is run by the Liaoning Provincial People's Government.

relationships.source: 辽宁警官高等专科学校

description.zh-cn: 辽宁警察学院的前身是辽宁警官高等专科学校。
description.en: Liaoning Police College was formerly known as Liaoning Police Officer College.

relationships.source: 辽宁省公安厅凌源劳改分局干部学校
relationships.target: 辽宁警官高等专科学校

description.zh-cn: 辽宁警官高等专科学校由1961年成立的辽宁省公安厅凌源劳改分局干部学校发展而来，于1985年建立大专。
description.en: Liaoning Police Officer College was developed from the Lingyuan Laogai Branch Cadre School of Liaoning Provincial Public Security Department (founded in 1961) and was established as a junior college in 1985.

position.en: Secretary of the Discipline Inspection Commission
